name: GolfGame Now With Added Golf!!
description:
Controls.

Hold left mouse button down to charge you shot 

Release left mouse to fire the ball will fly towards your mouse

Press Space for a small boost

R to return to menu

 Keys 1 - 0 to Switch between levels

Level Level Features

  1. Normal Controls
  2. Black Holes
  3. Maze and Cinemachine
  4. Breakable Door
  5. Checkpoints
  6. Tripwire Door
  7. Sticky Walls
  8. Homing Missiles
  9. Moving Target
  10. Upside down

Credit:

Star BackgroundGraul98: https://opengameart.org/content/star-field

Golf ball jpsweber: https://opengameart.org/content/golf-ball

Black Hole Cethiel: https://opengameart.org/content/cosmic-time-magic-effect

Grass Tile steroscopic: https://opengameart.org/content/grass-1

Sand Tile Catalin Pavel: https://opengameart.org/content/sand-texture-pack
